thread.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s performance at Zee Cine Awards 2017 a tribute to all four Khans – read details
thread.title_full: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s performance at Zee Cine Awards 2017 a tribute to all four Khans – read details

author: Aarti Iyengar
title: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s performance at Zee Cine Awards 2017 a tribute to all four Khans – read details
text:
Aamir Khan spotted with Dangal co-star Fatima Sana Shaikh – are the two working together again? 
Kareena Kapoor Khan stepping in to perform at Zee Cine Awards 2017 right after Katrina Kaif backed out due to injury issues has become quite the big news. Of course, it does deserve all the attention considering how this will be Kareena’s first performance after pregnancy. And we’ve just found out that her performance includes a tribute to all the four Khans she has worked with! A report on Mid-day states that the diva will be performing on songs from her movies with the Khan hunks. Precisely, songs from Bajrangi Bhaijaan ( Salman Khan ), 3 Idiots ( Aamir Khan ), Tashan ( Saif Ali Khan ) and Ra.One ( Shah Rukh Khan ). In other words, she’s going to have one helluva performance that will go down the history books of Bollywood! 
The news was confirmed as a source stated, “It will be a tribute to the Khans.Most of her hits were with the Khans, so she will perform on songs from films like Bajrangi Bhaijaan (Salman), 3 Idiots (Aamir), Tashan (Saif) and Ra.One (SRK) among others. Kareena will be styled by Manish Malhotra and has been paid a whopping amount for the act.” Earlier, Katrina was roped in to perform at the event but due to an injury. Her spokesperson released a statement saying, “This is to clarify that Katrina Kaif will no longer be performing at the Zee Cine Awards, due to an injury she met with on the sets. The doctors have advised her rest and to strictly avoid any strenuous physical activity or exertion. Katrina is extremely disappointed that she was not able to work through the injury. She is recuperating and will resume work shortly after a period of rest.” 
ALSO READ – Zee Cine Awards 2017: Kareena Kapoor Khan replaces Katrina Kaif after her injury 
It’s sad that she won’t be performing but we couldn’t be more excited to see Bebo cast her magic on fans! The thrilled actress even said, “This is the best phase of my life and it feels great to be back on the stage. Zee Cine Awards is a celebration of the best of Indian Cinema and being a part of this show truly feels special. I am sure the viewers will enjoy the act as much as I did rehearsing and performing it.” We will Kareena, we sure will! Along with her, among the list of performers are Govinda, Raveena Tandon, Alia Bhatt, Sunny Leone and Varun Dhawan. 
Want all the hot updates of Zee Cine Awards 2017? Well, all you gotta do is make sure you’re tuned to this space as we’ll get you all the gossips and reports right from the awards scene!
